keywords.indexterm: Configure license server connection in Web Author

body.p:
To configure the license server connection for , follow these steps:
Go to your Administration Page.
Select License.
Click the Configure button in the License Server section.
Enter the server URL and your authentication credentials for the license server. To configure a backup license server, select the Backup Server checkbox and enter the server URL and your authentication credentials for the backup server.
Click Submit.
You should see a message that informs you that the license configuration was successfully applied.
